blessings.subheader: Brought to you by @Space Warlord Organ Trading Simulator@https://store.steampowered.com/app/1507780/Space_Warlord_Organ_Trading_Simulator/
blessings.title: Organ Replacements

blessings.description: Recruit the Hardboiled Uncle Plasma to your Team.
blessings.title: Uncle Indemnity

blessings.description: Recruit the Hardboiled Liquid Friend to your Team.
blessings.title: The Big Sip

blessings.description: Your Team will play 5% better during next Season's Earlseason.
blessings.title: Earlbirds

blessings.description: Birds will unshell your players much more often.
blessings.title: Late to the Party

blessings.description: Improve your team's pitching by 10%. The last place team in the opposite subleague also gets +10% team pitching.
blessings.title: Tag Team Pitching

blessings.description: Improve your team's hitting by 10%. The last place team in the opposite subleague also gets +10% team hitting.
blessings.title: Tag Team Hitting

blessings.description: Is good offense. Swap your best hitting pitcher into your lineup.
blessings.title: The Best Defense

blessings.description: Is good defense. Swap your best pitching hitter into your rotation.
blessings.title: The Best Offense

decrees.description: Win the Championship to claim the Belt, then Defend it in Title Matches next Season. The Holder of the Belt is protected from Steals and Swaps and guaranteed a Postseason Birth. Should the Holder win the Championship, they will claim a Title.
decrees.title: Title Belt

decrees.description: The Champion of each season will play the following season under Pennants, starting every game at a severe disadvantage. Win the Internet Series under Pennants in order to Repent.
decrees.title: Pennants

decrees.description: Every Third Championship a Team wins will cause the Team and its Players to Evolve. Players that round the phylogenic Bases will get to go Home.
decrees.title: Based Evolution

wills.description: Steal a Player from the Idols board. Send a random Player from your Team back.

info.description: Which Idol do you want to steal?

wills.title: Plunder

wills.description: Swap a Player from a Team in the opposite Subleague with a Player from your Team.

info.description: Which team do you want to swap with?
What player do you want to swap for?
What player do you want to send back?

wills.title: Exchange

wills.description: Swap a Player from your Shadows to your active roster.

info.description: What player from the Shadows do you want to call up to the active roster?
What player from your active roster do you want to send to the Shadows?

wills.title: Foreshadow

wills.description: Boost a Player on your Team by 15% to 30%.

info.description: Which player do you want to Boost?

wills.title: Infuse

wills.description: Receive a mystery Benefit for one of your Teams' Players.

info.description: Which player do you want to receive the Benefit?

wills.title: Trust

wills.description: Call in an Alternate for a Player on your Team.

info.description: Which player do you want to call an Alternate for?

wills.title: Alternate

wills.description: Revoke a Player from your roster.

info.description: Which player do you want to revoke?

wills.title: Revoke

wills.description: Pick a modification for your Team next season.
wills.title: Enrich
